item.title: Bluetooth activation at startup on arch linux
item.description: Why? You might not have reach that point yet but bluez has been deprecating hciconfig and other tools. In bluez 5.44, it’s not there anymore. What is the problem? All hciconfig udev rules to activate bluetooth at startup won’t work anymore. Most forum posts solving bluetooth issues are now outdated. Once I updated to bluez 5.44, my service leveraging hciconfig to activate bluetooth at startup didn’t work anymore! What is the solution?
